name: Chillet

ability.name: Wriggling Weasel
ability.description:
Can be ridden.
Applies Dragon Dragon damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

description:
It can curl up its body and roll around at extremely high speeds.
Long ago, people would tie bags of milk to domesticated Chillet as they grazed to produce butter using this spinning force.

skills.name: Ice Missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: Dragon Cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: Dragon Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Icicle Cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: Draconic Breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: Cryst Breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Dragon Meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
